pma:database.name: neogame
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `encountertriggers` ( `id` int(3) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `strName` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `nEncounterID` int(3) NOT NULL, `fChance` float NOT NULL, `bLocBased` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `bDateBased` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `bHexBased` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `bUnique` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `bAIPassable` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `aArea` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `dateMin` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `dateMax` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `aHexTypes` longtext NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=134 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

table.name: encountertriggers
table.column: First ruins visit, and scavenging tutorial
